message.name: ERR_FININSTRUCTION_DELIVERYMETHOD_FV_INVALID
message.locale: Only payments with a delivery method of check, EFT or voucher can be canceled.
Only payments with a delivery method of check, EFT or voucher can be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FININSTRUCTION_FV_FININSTRUCTIONSTATUS_CANCELLED
message.locale: The payment specified is already canceled and therefore cannot be canceled.
The payment specified is already cancelled and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PMTCANCELLATION_FV_REASONCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: A reason for payment cancellation must be selected by the User.

message.name: ERR_FININSTRUCTION_FV_FININSTRUCTIONSTATUS_EXPIRED
message.locale: The FinancialInstruction specified "%1s" is an expired instruction and therefore cannot be canceled.
The FinancialInstruction specified "%1s" is an expired instruction and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_FV_RECONCILESTATUS_RECONCILED
message.locale: The FinancialInstruction specified "%1s" is a reconciled instruction and therefore cannot be canceled.
The FinancialInstruction specified "%1s" is a reconciled instruction and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_FV_MUST_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: Only canceled payments can be reissued.
Only cancelled payments can be reissued.

message.name: ERR_CANCELED_PAYMENT_AREADY_REGENERATED
message.locale: Canceled Payment was already reissued
Cancelled Payment was already reissued

message.name: ERR_DELIVERYFREQUENCY_XRV_MUST_BE_THE_SAME
message.locale: The delivery frequency of the nominee to whom the reissued payment is being issued must be the same as the delivery frequency of the nominee who was originally issued the payment.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEE_RV_DECEASED
message.locale: The nominee selected is deceased with a date of death of %1d and therefore cannot receive payments.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_INSTRUCTIONS_ON_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT
message.locale: This payment was issued in combination with other payment instructions as a single payment instrument. Therefore the payment instrument must be canceled.
This payment was issued in combination with other payment instructions as a single payment instrument. Therefore the payment instrument must be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENT_NOT_ISSUED
message.locale: This payment has not yet been issued and therefore cannot be canceled.
This payment has not yet been issued and therefore cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_REGENERATE_OR_INVALIDATE
message.locale: The options to reissue and invalidate the payment have both been selected. Only one option is allowed. Please select the correct option.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_REGENERATE_INVALID
message.locale: The payment cannot be reissued as it has been invalidated.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_INVALIDATION_INVALID
message.locale: The canceled payment cannot be invalidated as it has been reissued.
The cancelled payment cannot be invalidated as it has been reissued.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_INVALIDATED_CHANGE_OF_CIRC_REQUIRED
message.locale: A payment on case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been invalidated. Please review the circumstances on this case and take the appropriate action if the correct payment is to be generated.

message.name: INF_PAYMENT_INVALIDATED
message.locale: A payment on case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been invalidated.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_INVALIDATED
message.locale: The payment cannot be invalidated as it is already marked as invalid.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_COMPRISES_UNDERPAYMENT
message.locale: The payment cannot be invalidated as it comprises a benefit underpayment line item.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_XRV_REASSESSMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: The payment cannot be invalidated as the period covered by the payment has been reassessed.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_XRV_MULTIPLE_CASES
message.locale: The invalidated payment covers more than one case. All cases included in the payment must be reassessed to repay the invalidated payment.

message.name: ERR_INVALIDATING_THIRD_PARTY_PAYMENT
message.locale: Third party payments cannot be invalidated.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_REGENERATE_INVALIDCASESTATUS
message.locale: Payments can only be reissued on active or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_CANCELORINVALIDATE_THIRD_PARTY_PAYMENT
message.locale: Third party payments cannot be canceled.
Third party payments cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_GENPAYMENT_ACTIVESUSPENDEDCASES_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be reissued on active, suspended or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_REGENERATE_ACTIVECLOSEDCASES_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be reissued on active, closed or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_PMTINSTRUMENT_RV_REGENERATE_ACTIVESUSPENDEDCLOSEDCASES_ONLY
message.locale: Payments can only be reissued on active, suspended, closed or pending closure cases.

message.name: ERR_REGENERATING_THIRD_PARTY_PAYMENT_DIFFERENT_NOMINEE
message.locale: Third party payments cannot be regenerated to a different nominee.
